FuncDef: This command configures the mandatorypeer-interface-address. It is the destination address of the IPCC on the peer UNI-N used to reach the GMPLS Router ID of the UNI-N peer. It corresponds to the lmpCcRemoteIpAddr in RFC 4631.

ParaDef.Info: The interface address of the IPCC next-hop. Values-ipv4-address - a.b.c.d.
